category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_preselect_first_task
preference.preference_description: Determines whether in Active Workspace client the first task is pre-selected when user goes to Inbox. Valid values are: * true: First task in inbox will be pre-selected. This is the default value. * false: First task in inbox will not be pre-selected.
